extendedInfo.description: ConvertPad and ConvertPad Plus(Ad-free version) are most powerful and fully featured Unit converter, Currency converter and Calculator. It's a simple but the most powerful unit converter. (10,000,000+ downloads for Ad version).ConvertPad is intuitive and easy to use. Features fast, real time currency and unit conversion in a clean interface.Features; (Ad-Free Version)* Universal Unit converter and Calculator  . Real-time conversion and calculation  . Unit Comparison Table  . Direct Arithmetic Calculation  . Country-Specific Units  . Wiki Searching for Unit information* Currency conversions   . Option for selecting favorite exchange rate  . Support 160+ Currencies* Multiple languages support   . Supports 26 languages.  . Supports 2 preferences as primary & secondary language.* Customizing feature for Favorite Units  . Favorite Categories and Units  . Various Sorting option* User-defined Categories and Units  . Feature for adding User-defined units in built-in categories  . Feature for making User's own categories and units  . Formula(functional form) for user-defined units.* Various Setting option  . Various Color Themes  . Backup/Restore User-defined Units on SD Card* Steam tables  . Thermodynamic Steam tablesNOTE;** If you have any issues with app update, please mail to convertpad@gmail.com. The developer cannot respond to market review.** Permission for "Internet access" and "R/W access on external storage" are for Update Currency and Backup user-defined units on SD Card respectively.** Please try out read the 50,000+ reviews for original ConvertPad Ad. version which has 10,000,000+ downloads. If you have the experience of original, you will not be disappointed with ConvertPad Plus!** Please leave your comments for ConvertPad on market. it will ENCOURAGE the developer to continue his effort.Older Version: v 2.5* New features  New language(Hebrew) added.  Searching Icon(Wikipedia) changed.  Separate Input for Stone/Pound added.v 2.4  Separate Input for Feet/Inches & Pounds/Ounces.  Tablet size support.  UI for Calculator improved.v 2.3  Country-Specific Units  Wiki Searching for Unit information  Circle/Sphere unit  User interface on Setting & Favorites optionsv. 2.2  Currency rate update (after the format changed from one of the providers).  Number/period input issue on User-defined units  User interface on Calculator  Memorizing cursor location on each category  (Conversion Table)  Dec/Bin/Hex  Shoe/Clothing/Ring Size  dBm/Volts/Wattsv. 2.1* Option for various Color themes* Formula type(functional-form) input for user-defined units.(ex: 2*x+5)* Reference unit option for user-defined units.* Text size optimization for various devices.* Memorizing feature on Calculator (Click on input field)* ASME Steam tables (Thermodynamics)* New language(Turkish)* Minor bugs fixed.

reviews.title: Really useful
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Very accurate,  great presentation and fun to use. Converts from everything to everything that you could ever need.
reviews.author: Trevor Wilson

reviews.title: Looking good so far
reviews.comment: But how can I do arcsin, arctan and arcos in the Functional forms?  Hope you can help!!
reviews.author: Nigel Finlow

reviews.title: The best conversion app
reviews.comment: Re-review. As this app has been my main conversion program since the early years, I have learned really to appreciate the clean, easy to use UI. Till today, no other app of this area comes even close and I have tried 20+ of them. If you are looking for the best conversion app, this is it... Hands down. Even the free version puts the other commercial apps to shame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: The very best conversion app. Converts everything. I\'ve bought the paid version out of shame after using the free app on three different devices over the years.
reviews.author: Trevor Groves

reviews.title: Light and useful
reviews.comment: Has all the conversions I\'ve needed plus many, many more. One of my top 5.
reviews.author: Eddie Fayard

reviews.title: Used to be good enough a year ago
reviews.comment: But now it\'s way too outdated.  Please update to Jelly Bean holo GUI standards and preferably add a tablet version.
reviews.author: Sergey Bebenin

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Star down for avast repoting malvare: sms agent qa- trj.Any ideas?

reviews.title: Doesn\'t support 4.1.2
reviews.comment: Loved and user of paid app. Sadly doesnt work with android upgrade. Feel cheated now Samsung Note N7000

reviews.title: HTC Velocity 4G
reviews.comment: Brilliant app, never fails to amaze me. Thank you developer\'s.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Go to app for conversions. Would like a light theme.

reviews.title: Great app for engineers - Yupiii :)
reviews.comment: I work in engineering and this up is indispensable for me. Great!

reviews.title: All you need
reviews.comment: Best converter for planet earth

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Like the last update
reviews.author: sergey stephanian

reviews.title: Not satisfied
reviews.comment: I was looking for an area conversion in \'cent\' which is an Indian unit but didn\'t find it here.I reported it to the app developer but he didn\'t even care to reply back.Just a promise of including the unit in future updates may have satisfied me but the developer didn\'t even care his customers.
reviews.author: Nithin Pullarcot

reviews.title: Update the design
reviews.comment: Update the design will be great
reviews.author: Jimmy Leonardo

reviews.comment: Where is pressure conversion? Paid bar ATM incheswater etc?

reviews.title: Wrong kVA
reviews.comment: Need to fix the kVA conversion. It is not a 1 from kW. They are not the same thing. It should be kW/PF (power factor) I would go with .8 for PF
reviews.author: David Dennis

reviews.comment: perfect

reviews.title: Great update.
reviews.comment: After 2 years of usage I can honestly say this is the very best app of its kind. Extremely polished & professional, & VERY user friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: Only thing missing I\'d the ability to toggle favorites on and off. If you disable favorites you have top reselect the ones you want again.
reviews.author: Ronny Hippler
